titles.title: We Come Together To Love And Praise Our God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We come together to love and praise our God
We come together to love and to be loved.
We come together to heal and be healed.
Praise His name, glory hallelujah, praise His holy name.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Venimos juntos, para amarte y adorarte
Venimos juntos, para amar y ser amados
Venimos juntos, a sanar y ser sanados
Gloria a Dios, Gloria, Aleluya
Gloria al Santo Dios.
